feed.title: John Braat's Blog
feed.subtitle: My learnings, thoughts on software, programming, tech, and my personal life.

entry.title: You Don't Need To Be an Expert To Share Your Learnings
entry.summary: For the longest time I thought I should be an expert to share my knowledge. Here are my thoughts and advice on how to change this mindset.
entry.content: For the longest time I thought I should be an expert to share my knowledge. Here are my thoughts and advice on how to change this mindset.

entry.title: A Guide on How to Set Personal Goals
entry.summary: Personal goals are one of the fundamental requirements for any high achieving person. Here is my guide on how to set and achieve them.

entry.title: How I Manage My Life With The GTD System

entry.title: Building Software Every Day For a Year
entry.summary: I have challenged myself to build software every day for a whole year straight. Here are the reasons behind it, how it's going and my learnings so far.

entry.title: My Favorite Tech Stack to Build SaaS

entry.title: Marketing Sucks! Or Does It?
